Drew Austin lives in New York City.

He writes about cities, technology, and culture: how physical and digital spaces are evolving together and how they interact.

His writing lives in a few places: his weekly newsletter, his blog (older stuff here), and sites like Real Life where he contributes.

He sometimes gives talks and goes on podcasts and is available for both.

If you think we should work together or just talk, get in touch.
